prompts.check_stream_status: Check the status of {protocol} stream at {url}. Look for: connection state, active viewers, uptime
prompts.analyze_stream_quality: Analyze quality metrics for stream {stream_id}: bitrate stability, frame drops, buffer health
prompts.check_latency: Measure end-to-end latency for {stream_url}. Acceptable range: {min_latency}-{max_latency}ms
prompts.alert_on_issue: Send alert for {issue_type} on {stream_id}. Severity: {severity}. Details: {details}

metadata.description: Template for creating client-specific stream monitoring agents
metadata.customization_guide: Replace 'generic' with client name, adjust tools and prompts for specific protocols
